page.title: 06Health in Aston
page.content: Dr.s Tatton, Gregory, Hillman, Watson, Kavanagh, Scorah and Gibbons are all based at the 40 roomed Aston Health centre and were trained for 5 yrs. They work 6-7 hrs a day in the clinic, visit houses usually between 11-13.00 and are on call 24 hrs.They care for 15,000 people. On visits he carries 2 bags. Stethoscope, prescriptions, neccesary instruments in one,and drugs for serious cases in the other. The most common illnesses in this area are asthma,cold,50% psychological,chicken pox,German measles,measles and flu.The most serious illnesses are cancer and heart complaints, and the most rare bone cancer. Pain killers are the most prescribed medicine. The 6 doctors deputise for each other when necessary. Chiropodists, speech therapists,nurses and home helps visit homes,receptionists make appointments.
